description: VictorOpsConfig configures notifications via VictorOps. See https://prometheus.io/docs/alerting/latest/configuration/#victorops_config

api_key.description: The secret's key that contains the API key to use when talking to the VictorOps API. It must be at them same namespace as CRD fallback to global setting if empty

entity_display_name.description: Contains summary of the alerted problem.

message_type.description: Describes the behavior of the alert (CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO).

monitoring_tool.description: The monitoring tool the state message is from.

routing_key.description: A key used to map the alert to a team.

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

state_message.description: Contains long explanation of the alerted problem.
